title: Why We Chose WebAssembly (Wasm) for Our Edge Runtime
author: Bogdan Kurnosov
description: Discover why Gcore chose Wasm for building a new serverless edge computing service, and how Wasm helps with deploying distributed applications.
cntitle: 我们为何为边缘运行时选择 WebAssembly (Wasm)
cndescription: 了解 Gcore 为何选择 Wasm 来构建新的无服务器边缘计算服务，以及 Wasm 如何帮助部署分布式应用程序。
